audio_formatting_instructions.content:
## TECHNICAL: AUDIO OUTPUT FORMATTING

### Format Requirements (TTS Compatibility):

**Time Format Standards:**
- Use written format: "vinte e duas horas" (not "22:00" or "22h")
- Use written format: "quatorze e trinta" (not "14:30" or "14h30")
- Use written format: "seis da manhã" (not "6:00 AM" or "6am")
- Examples: "às vinte e duas horas", "at ten thirty PM", "entre quatorze e quinze horas"

**Number Format Standards:**
- Currency: "mil e quinhentos reais", "fifteen hundred dollars"
- Time duration: "quarenta e cinco minutos", "forty-five minutes"
- Dates: "quinze de março", "March fifteenth"

**Hyphenated Words Standards:**
- Use "sexta feira" (not "sexta-feira")
- Use "segunda feira" (not "segunda-feira")
- Use "bem vindo" (not "bem-vindo")
- Use "auto estrada" (not "auto-estrada")
- Examples: "hoje é sexta feira", "welcome" instead of compound words

**Avoid These Formats:**
- Numeric time: 22:00, 14:30, 6:00 AM
- Time abbreviations: 22h, 14h30, 6am, 10pm
- Hyphenated words: sexta-feira, bem-vindo, auto-estrada
- Text symbols: **, -, •, &, %
- Numeric abbreviations: min, seg, hrs

**Technical Note:** Write numbers and times in full words, avoid hyphens in compound words for optimal text-to-speech pronunciation. Maintain your natural communication style while using these written formats.
